backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, baby crib reservations with time slot management, loyalty points, Stripe payment integration, and access control using mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including splash screen restoration, Version 8 color palette, Builder 4-step form, and micro-interactions with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, key functionality, and design system integration for the NEXUS application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, defining color variables, spacing, and design tokens for the component library.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts (Darker Grotesque, Inter, Playfair Display) and mounting the React application at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with AppContextProvider, ScreenRouter managing 12 screen types with forward/backward/fade transitions (300ms), and SupportChat integration.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Empty or legacy file with no content.
frontend/src/components/BookingContact.t: Booking contact form with name/phone/address fields, Swiss phone validation, conditional address requirement for domicile bookings, success toast, and navigation back to Explorer.
frontend/src/components/BookingDate.tsx: Displays a date and time picker for booking appointments, showing the next 4 days and 30-minute time slots from 9:00 to 19:00, filtering out past times and provider-blocked slots.
Allows users to select between home service (domicile) or studio location for their booking, displaying availability and pricing for each option.
frontend/src/components/Builder.tsx: Multi-step studio profile builder for tattoo/piercing/branding/illustration artists, collecting cover photo, logo, name, category, cities, phone, and gallery images before publishing.
frontend/src/components/BuilderPreviewMo: Modal component that displays a preview of the studio profile being built, showing cover photo, logo, name, category, badges, bio, and social media links.
Progress indicator component showing current step, completed steps with checkmarks, and future steps in a horizontal stepper layout.
Client-facing dashboard displaying pending and completed reservations with the ability to cancel pending bookings and logout.
frontend/src/components/ClientLogin.tsx: Client login component with two-step phone/OTP authentication flow. Generates a random 4-digit OTP, displays it via toast notification, and validates it before navigating to the client dashboard.
frontend/src/components/CroppingModal.ts: Modal component for cropping images with adjustable zoom (scale) and pan (offset). Supports pointer/touch dragging, maintains aspect ratio (3:1 or 1:1), and returns crop parameters including scale, offsets, and original dimensions.
frontend/src/components/Explorer.tsx: Provider discovery interface with filters for category, mode (Domicile/Salon), and city. Includes geolocation-based sorting to show nearest providers and displays filtered provider cards.
frontend/src/components/GalleryPhotoUplo: Gallery manager for uploading multiple photos with a minimum count requirement. Supports adding/removing photo slots (with drag handles) and uses ImageUploader for each slot with 1:1 aspect ratio.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploader.ts: Image upload component with drag-and-drop support, file validation (type/size), automatic compression when localStorage is full, and integration with CroppingModal. Persists image data and crop parameters to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/NexusOS.tsx: Provider dashboard (NexusOS) with tabs for booking requests, weekly agenda management, and analytics. Displays pending booking requests with accept/refuse actions and a calendar grid for blocking time slots.
frontend/src/components/PaymentForm.tsx: A React component that renders a payment form with card number, expiry, and CVC fields, including real-time validation, formatting, and error display. It notifies the parent component of validation state changes via a callback prop.
frontend/src/components/ProLogin.tsx: A login screen for professional users with email/password authentication against demo credentials (pro@nexus.ch / nexus2025). On successful login, it transitions to the NexusOS screen.
frontend/src/components/ProviderDetail.t: Displays detailed information about a selected service provider including a hero image, services list, and allows users to select a service and continue to booking. Features category-specific background gradients and a back button.
A visual radius selector component with an animated circular representation and range slider, allowing users to select a distance radius from 0 to 50 km with real-time visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/ServicePhotoUplo: Manages photo uploads for a service with a required main photo and up to 4 additional photos (5 total). Includes drag handles, delete buttons, and uses ImageUploader component with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/components/Splash.tsx: The landing/splash screen component featuring a hero background image, NEXUS branding with Playfair Display typography, and two action buttons to explore services or access the professional space.
frontend/src/components/Subscription.tsx: React component that handles subscription flow with payment form, displays trial subscription details, and processes payment confirmation with a 30-day trial period.
frontend/src/components/SupportChat.tsx: Floating chat widget component with auto-responses for common support topics (booking, payment, technical, account) and quick action buttons.
frontend/src/context/AppContext.tsx: Global app context defining TypeScript interfaces for providers, services, bookings, subscriptions, reviews, sessions, and screen navigation state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarousel.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for carousel functionality.
Empty file, likely placeholder for counting animation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for custom cursor functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Custom hook for handling image uploads with drag-and-drop support, file validation (format, size), and base64 conversion with preview.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for parallax scrolling effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for scroll-triggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind imports, custom CSS variables for dark theme color palette (#0a0a0a black, #E8D5B0 sand accent), button styles (btn-sand, btn-outline-white, btn-white) with hover/active micro-interactions, form input styles with focus states, card hover effects, and shake animation for error states.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient and wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication and data fetching.
frontend/src/types/cropping.ts: TypeScript interfaces for image cropping functionality, defining CropParams (scale, offsets, base64 data, dimensions) and ImageData (base64 string with optional crop parameters).
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Empty utility file, likely placeholder for future aura generation functionality.
frontend/src/utils/haversine.ts: Implements Haversine formula to calculate distance in kilometers between two GPS coordinates (latitude/longitude pairs), rounded to one decimal place.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Utility functions for localStorage usage tracking, base64 image compression using canvas with configurable JPEG quality, and calculating base64 string size in bytes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence functions for maintaining state (like admin tokens) across navigation and URL cleanup helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark theme with custom colors (#0a0a0a background, #E8D5B0 sand accent), Inter/Playfair Display fonts, custom border radii, glow box shadows, and accordion animations with tailwindcss-animate plugin.
project_state.json: Project state document describing NEXUS Platform as an ultra-premium tattoo studio/branding platform with Caffeine stack (Motoko + React/TypeScript + Tailwind), featuring studio profiles, booking calendar, quote generator, explorer module, and 39 CHF/month pricing with complete design system specifications.
